Duncan Toys

About Us

Since 1929, Duncan® Toys has been putting smiles on the faces of its customers with its legendary assortment of yo-yos and other skill toys. Today, Duncan® is one of the world’s largest and most recognized toy makers with a full line of products ranging across all major categories.


Our Mission

Duncan® is committed to engaging children of all ages and all generations with high-quality toys. Whether you are shopping for your child or for your own inner child, we believe our toys will help you find your inner fun.
